documents.document: @Knhannah Yay! And don't be silly, you're one of my faves 👍🏼

Friends & family I've talked to this weekend, who are not on Twitter, seem to have little idea of the magnitude of what's happening in USA
Hey @radionz just listened to news: why no mention of thousands of people protesting #MuslimBan, chaos at airports, US residents detained?
How is NZ Govt going to stand up to what's happening in the US @annetterongotai @pmbillenglish? This is fascism & we need to act

@AlisonBallance Brilliant! Where do you put the traps? My outdoors ones not getting anything
@Michael_J_Parry Arm badly, leg slightly
@cwmagee Accident involving a tree, a broken branch and gravity. All good now.
Kid out of surgery and doing well with new titanium-reinforced arm. I paced my way through the 2-hour op. It helped https://t.co/AaF9BaEDLJ
@WgtnFree Thank you! And thanks to your awesome staff for their top work yesterday x
@UpsideBackwards Yes to visitors, will send news tomorrow x
@teradar haha no we survived the shopping - we can blame gravity for the hospital stay, and a 🌲
Ending day in parent bed at Wellington Hospital hugely grateful for @WgtnFree ambulance service and our country's fab FREE emergency care 👍🏼
"Mum, you've been to Antarctica, you'll be OK": daughter tries to convince me that going shopping at David Jones is not a "major expedition"

@PipAdam I got kicked out of class - told not to come back! - for wearing green nail polish. But not before I'd learned to touch type :)
@PipAdam Me too! But in my year it started being called "keyboard skills" and for the first time there was a boy in the class #1980s
